abstract: The city of Chicago will give a group of investors led by Citigroup’s Citi Infrastructure Investors up to six more months to raise the necessary cash to complete its $2.5 billion deal for Midway Airport.
lead_paragraph: The city of Chicago will give a group of investors led by Citigroup’s Citi Infrastructure Investors up to six more months to raise the necessary cash to complete its $2.5 billion deal for Midway Airport.

headline.main: Chicago Gives Citi More Time to Finance Midway Deal
